entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: N 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
